message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $112 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $117.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to pay $114 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $119.
I'm sorry, but I've reached my limit. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product, and that's my final offer.
